summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Community Development; making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund in aid of the improvement of The Alley in Block 22, Dumar Div. No. 3 Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same under Local Improvement District No.\_\_\_\_, as created by Ordinance\_\_\_\_\_; authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services therefor; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
